�̱áa [s̕aːt̚kʰa] (also called Stalkatka, or Skalkatka),
or Salcatka in German, was a German fortress that defended
Constantinople (Istanbul) on the Asian side during the 1st
World War. The fortress, which was never completed, was built
from 1914 to 1916 by German engineers on a hill near the
village of Sultançiftliği in the Sarıyer district
of Istanbul. The Turkish name for the fortress means "Fortress
of the German Youth" in Turkish.

data.sampled: about it.  It seems weird to me that someone would just suddenly start liking something out of no where.  I can't recall ever randomly deciding I was a fan of something that I had never even tried before.  It always came from some degree of exposure.  Maybe it is just one of those things, like cilantro, in the way that some people just naturally like it and some don't, but I think it's a little odd.  Does anyone else feel this way?  I mean I am glad people are liking the show and talking about it but the fact that it was literally nothing two years ago is what makes it weird to me.  People are acting like this is the best show ever but two years ago it didn't even exist.  I apologize if this is an unpopular opinion, I just had to get that off my chest.  Like I said, I am happy people are liking it, I am just surprised by how much the culture has changed in a relatively short period of time.  Also, as much as I am getting the feeling that Cowboy Bebop could be one of those rare cases of an anime that even non-anime-fans can enjoy, I will not be watching it myself.  I refuse to pay for Netflix.  They took one of my favorite shows, Arrested Development, off Amazon Prime, and made it exclusive to their service.  I am very much opposed to exclusivity deals and have no interest in supporting that business practice.  That is another thing that surprises me about Cowboy Bebop, that it is on Netflix.  I always thought it was a cult classic that only weird nerds like me knew about.  I would have guessed it to be on something like Crunchyroll.  I apologize for my ignorance.  I am sure there are plenty of people out there that are both anime fans and fans of classic American cartoons.  I have just never met any.

data.sampled:
for @param.

2. For every type definition @tparam.
  1. If @tparam is the first identifier in the type parameter list, add `<#tparam#>` to the list of open generics.
  2. If the immediately preceding generic is not `<>` but `<>, @tparam`, replace the `, @tparam` with `<#tparam#>`.

3. For every generic parameter list (not in an angle bracket context), if the first identifier in the generic parameter list is `var`, `out`, or `in`, remove it and move the rest of the generics to the right. Otherwise, remove the `<>` and move the generics to the right.

4. Go to step 1.

5. If `<>` is still part of the open generics, remove it.

6. Remove all consecutive commas at the end of a type parameter list.

7. Replace all remaining commas at the end of a type parameter list with a space.

8. If there is no space before the open angle bracket, add one.

9. If there is no space after the close angle bracket, remove it.

#### 5. Remove `generic`, `partial`, and `abstract`

Remove all three keywords.

### Conclusion

Generics in the C# type system are complex and often have to be treated differently in different contexts. This tutorial has walked the reader through a formalization of those contexts using a context-free grammar and provided a step-by-step explanation of a PEG parser that can parse C# generics. This can be used as a starting point for your own C# parser, or as inspiration for how to approach generics in other languages.

data.sampled:
�ārī, Qum

The Jāmiʻ Mosque of Qum, also known as Masjid-i Jāmeʻ-ye Qum, is a mosque in Qum, Iran. It is the largest congregational mosque in Iran after the Masjed-e Shah in Isfahan, and is one of the oldest extant structures in the city, dating from the early 11th century CE under the Buyid dynasty. It served as a model for the great Friday Mosques in Isfahan and Yazd, and is home to the shrine of the martyrdom of Jafar al-Sadiq, the sixth Shia Imam, in whose honor it is named. The mosque has undergone numerous restorations throughout its history, the most significant of which occurred in the 17th and 18th centuries CE under the Safavid and Qajar dynasties.

The main sanctuary of the mosque contains the tomb and shrine of Jafar al-Sadiq, covered with tiles and gold-plated copper. The mosque complex is enclosed by a wall, and contains four courtyards, two porticos and two minarets, one of which was restored in 1953. The mosque's main entrance faces South and contains a porch supported by twenty-two columns, most of which were added during the Timurid period. Another entrance on the West includes a grand iwan (portico), which features a monumental vaulted ceiling and is decorated with blue tiles and calligraphy. The mosque's sanctuary contains five mihrabs and three pulpits, including the pulpit of Jafar al-Sadiq himself, which is made of wood and covered with gold leaf. The main dome of the mosque is adorned with stalactite tiles and stands at over 60 feet tall. The mosque is a major destination for Shia pilgrims, who visit to pay their

20. ‘बेनामी सम्पत्ति लेन-देन का निषेध अधिनियम, 1988 (PBPT अधिनियम)श् के संदर्भ में, निम्नलिखित कथनों पर विचार कीजिएः
1- किसी सम्पत्ति का लेन-देन बेनामी लेन-देन नहीं समझा जाएगा यदि सम्पत्ति का मालिक उस लेन-देन के बारे में अवगत नहीं है।
2- बेनामी पाई गई सम्पत्तियों सरकार द्वारा जब्त किए जाने के लिए दायी होंगी।
3- यह अधिनियम जाँच के लिए तीन प्राधिकारियों का उपबंध करता है किंतु यह किसी अपीलीय क्रियाविधि का उपबंध नहीं करता।

उपर्युक्त कथनों में से कौन-सा/से सही है/हैं?

(a) केवल 1
(b) केवल 2
(c) केवल 1 और 3
(d) केवल 2 और 3

, choose correct answer:

data.sampled:
your home and garden, or simply give your space a refresh, there are many ways to decorate on a budget. Here are ten simple and affordable ways to decorate your home, plus tips for saving money while doing it.
1. Repurpose old furniture
Before you toss out that old dresser or table, consider giving it a new look with a fresh coat of paint or some new hardware. You can also repurpose furniture for a new use, like turning a coffee table into a ottoman or an old bookshelf into a storage bench. Get creative and give new life to your old furniture pieces.
2. Shop secondhand stores and online marketplaces
You can find some great deals on home decor at secondhand stores, flea markets, and online marketplaces like Facebook Marketplace or Craigslist. Keep an open mind and be willing to look past minor flaws or imperfections, as you can always give the piece a new coat of paint or some other customization to make it fit your style.
3. Use nature as decor
Bring the outdoors inside by using natural elements like plants, flowers, and branches as decor. You can display potted plants on shelves or window sills, or create a DIY wall hanging with dried flowers and branches. You can also use baskets or crates to create rustic storage solutions for your home.
4. Hang up inexpensive art
Art doesn't have to be expensive to make a big impact on your home decor. You can find inexpensive prints or posters online, or create your own art with canvas, paint, and a little bit of creativity. You can also display family photos or children's artwork in frames to add a personal touch to your space.
5. Update your lighting
One of the easiest and most affordable ways to update your home decor is by changing the lighting. Swap out old, outdated fixtures for something more modern, or add a floor lamp or table lamp to brighten up a dark corner. You can also use string lights or LED candles to add

prompt.content:
19. भारत में एक ऐसा स्थान है, जहाँ यदि आप समुद्र किनारे खड़े होकर समुद्र का अवलोकन करें, तो आप पाएँगे कि दिन में दो बार समुद्री जल तटीय रेखा से कुछ किलोमीटर पीछे की ओर चला जाता है और फिर तट पर वापस आता है, और जब जल पीछे हटा होता है, तब आप वास्तव में समुद्र तल पर चल सकते हैं। यह अनूठी घटना कहाँ देखी जाती है?
(a) भावनगर में
(b) भीमुनिपटनम में
(c) चांदीपुर में
(d) नागपट्टिनम में

, choose correct answer:

data.sampled:
�在《黑暗龙谷》中将主角——玛拉莎描述成"黑发、金眼的绝世佳人",而根据《冰与火之歌》的描述,我们知道琼恩·雪诺的眼睛是灰色的。这就引出了一个有趣的问题,乔治·R.R.马丁会不会给《权力的游戏》中的主人公们画像?
在《权力的游戏》中,我们能看到马丁从《冰与火之歌》中摘出的一些形容词来描述角色们的相貌,但却没有明确的画像流传出来,我们只能在脑海中描绘出书中人物的样子。但这却没能阻止很多粉丝的想象力,很多人将书中的角色塑造成自己心目中的理想形象,并分享到网上给别人欣赏。
我们也能找到很多乔治·R.R.马丁自己画的《冰与火之歌》中人物的画像,他甚至还开设了一门名为"世界建构"的课程,教学生如何通过绘画来创造出自己的世界,但他从来没有给《权力的游戏》中人物画像。
不过,这并不能阻

prompt.content:
14. प्रदूषण की समस्याओं का समाधान करने के संदर्भ में, जैवोपचारण (बायोरेमीडिएशन) तकनीक के कौन-सा/से लाभ है/हैं?

1- यह प्रकृति में घटित होने वाली जैवनिम्नीकरण प्रक्रिया का ही संवर्धन कर प्रदूषण को स्वच्छ करने की तकनी है। 2- कैडमियम और लेड जैसी भारी धातुओं से युक्त किसी भी संदूषक को सूक्ष्मजीवों के प्रयोग से जैवोपचारण द्वासरा सहज ही और पूरी तरह उपचारित किया जा सकता है।
3- जैवोपचारण के लिए विशेषतः अभिकल्पित सूक्ष्मजीवों को सृजित करने के लिए आनुवंशिक इंजीनियरी (जेनेटिक इंजीनियरिंग) का उपयोग किया जा सकता है।

नीचे दिए गए कूट का प्रयोग कर सही उत्तर चुनिए:

(a) केवल 1
(b) केवल 2 और 3
(c) केवल 1 और 3
(d) 1, 2 और 3

, choose correct answer:

3. ‘पूर्व अधिगम की मान्यता स्कीम (रिकग्निशन ऑफ प्रायर लर्निंग स्कीम)’ का कभी-कभी समाचारों में किस संदर्भ में उल्लेख किया जाता है?
(a) निर्माण कार्य में लगे कर्मकारों के पारंपरिक मार्गों से अर्जित कौशल का प्रमाणन
(b) दूरस्थ अधिगम कार्यक्रमों के लिए विश्वविद्यालयों में व्यक्तियों को पंजीकृत करना
(c) सार्वजनिक क्षेत्र के कुछ उपक्रमों में ग्रामीण और नगरीय निर्धन लोगों के लिए कुछ कुशल कार्य आरक्षित करना
(d) राष्ट्रीय कौशल विकास कार्यक्रम के अधीन प्रशिक्षणार्थियों द्वारा अर्जित कौशल का प्रमाणन

about getting the COVID vaccine because they feel they are too busy.

prompt.content:
2. ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों और सिन्धु घाटी के लोगों की संस्कृति के बीच अंतर के संबंध में, निम्नलिखित कथनों में से कौन-सा/से सही है/हैं?
1- ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्य कवच और शिरस्त्रण (हेलमेट) का उपयोग करते थे जबकि सिन्धु घाटी सभ्यता के लोगों में इनके उपयोग का कोई साध्य नहीं मिलता।
2- ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों को स्वर्ण, चाँदी और ताम्र का ज्ञान था जबकि सिन्धु घाटी के लोगों को कवल ताम्र और लोह का ज्ञान था।
3- ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों ने घोड़े को पालतू बना लिया था जबकि इस बात का कोई साक्ष्य नहीं है कि सिन्धु घाअी के लोग इस पशु को जानते थे।

नीचे दिए गए कूट का प्रयोग कर सही उत्तर चुनिएः

(a) केवल 1
(b) केवल 2 और 3
(c) केवल 1 और 3
(d) 1, 2 और 3

, choose correct answer:
